reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects information related to interests, PII (Personally Identifiable Information), email addresses for promotional materials, payment card information, and other user-provided information.

reply.analysis: The app collects various types of data as outlined in the privacy policy document related to user interests, personally identifiable information, email addresses, payment card information, and other user-provided information.
reply.reference: The app collects information related to interests, PII (Personally Identifiable Information), email addresses for promotional materials, payment card information, and other user-provided information. URL: https://choprafoundation.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that when collecting data, the app mentions the purpose of the collection and use, such as for effecting transactions or sending promotional materials.
reply.reference: When we collect credit card information, the sole purpose of the collection and use of that information is to effect transactions for the sale of products and services or accept donations. If you have consented to receive promotional materials (e.g., newsletters) or notifications from us, we may periodically use your email address to send you such materials related to the Services. URL: https://choprafoundation.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by contacting the provided email at info@choprafoundation.org or making changes to user profile information connected to the account. Users can also opt out of receiving newsletters and promotional communications by following the instructions included in each communication.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can opt out of data collection or delete data by contacting via email or modifying user profile information. Additionally, users can manage their newsletter and promotional communication preferences.
reply.reference: If you would like to make a request, cancel your account or request we delete or no longer use your account information to provide you services, contact us at info@choprafoundation.org or make changes to any user profile information connected to your account as available. URL: https://choprafoundation.org/privacy-policy/ Users may update or change their PII by editing their profile through a registration form or otherwise. We will make good faith efforts to make requested changes in our then active databases as soon as reasonably practicable. URL: https://choprafoundation.org/privacy-policy/ If you no longer wish to receive our newsletter and promotional communications, you may opt-out of receiving them by following the instructions included in each communication. You may also update your profile on the sites that contain a profile and change your newsletter and promotional communications’ preferences. URL: https://choprafoundation.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that personal information may be shared with outside contractors, agents, sponsors, or third party vendors for various purposes.
reply.reference: We may share your PII with those who help us manage or provide the Services, or with outside contractors, agents or sponsors who help us with different aspects. URL: https://choprafoundation.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app may share data with outside contractors, agents, sponsors, affiliated companies for business reasons, and third-party vendors such as PayPal for order/donation processing. Additionally, third party ad network providers, advertisers, sponsors, and traffic measurement services may access data for advertising purposes.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions various third parties with whom data may be shared for different purposes, including order processing, advertising, and network services.
reply.reference: The app may share your PII with outside contractors, agents or sponsors for administration and contest prize fulfillment purposes. Additionally, the app mentions sharing PII with affiliated companies if there is a business reason to do so. Third party vendors like PayPal are involved in order/donation processing. Furthermore, the app utilizes third-party ad network providers, advertisers, sponsors, and traffic measurement services for advertising and analytics. URL: https://choprafoundation.org/privacy-policy/
